channel.title: Comments on: This game is really “balanced” most of the time…
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: PastalavistaBabe
item.dc:creator: PastalavistaBabe
item.description: This was a 150 ticket TDM btw.

item.title: By: cardboardisdelicious
item.dc:creator: cardboardisdelicious
item.description: Ive found the absolute worst is when one team has 2-3 level 400 pilots who know how to destroy every aa gun and escape anti other anti air forces. I’m sitting here level 30 trying hopelessly to take them out
item.content:encoded: Ive found the absolute worst is when one team has 2-3 level 400 pilots who know how to destroy every aa gun and escape anti other anti air forces. I’m sitting here level 30 trying hopelessly to take them out
